product_name: Novara Big Mouth Water Bottle - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Our Novara Big Mouth 24 fl. oz. water bottle helps meet your hydrating needs when you're out on a ride. Wide mouth bottle design makes filling the bottle a breeze and accommodates ice cubes easily. BPA- and phthalate-free polyethylene is easy to squeeze to ensure a fast flow of your beverage; textured area enhances grip.
short_description: Our Novara Big Mouth 24 fl. oz. water bottle helps meet your hydrating needs when you're out on a ride.
